datasets.name: Internal migration by English regions and Wales

lede: Internal migration refers to residential moves between different geographic areas within the UK. These statistics are compiled from data from main three sources: The NHS Patient Register, The NHS Central Register (NHSCR) and the Higher Education Statistics Agency (HESA).
name: Migration within the UK
